sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-panel title="Deposit">
    <template #form-wrap>
      <Form
        title="Select currency"
        type="select"
        :options="wallets.map(wallet => wallet.currency.capitalize())"
      />
      <Form
        :title="'Amount in ' + currency"
        type="sm_text"
        subtitle="Min 0.01"
        value="0.01"
        id="amount"
      />
      <Button class="pay_button" theme="apple" text="PAY" />
    </template>
  </v-panel>
</template>

<script>
import Form from '../Form.vue';
import Button from '../Button.vue';
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'Deposit',
  components: {
    Form,
    Button,
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters({
      currency: 'popups/exchangeSelectedCurrency',
      wallets: 'auth/profileWallets',
    }),
  },
  mounted() {
    this.$anime({
      targets: '.deposit',
      scale: [0.95, 1],
      easing: 'easeOutExpo',
      duration: 800,
    });
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="sass" scoped>
@import "../../../../scss/smart-grid"
@import "../../../../scss/variables"


.pay_button
  width: 100px

  @include xs-block
    width: calc(100% - 60px)
  @include sm-block
    width: calc(100% - 60px)
  @include md-block
    width: 100px
  @include lg-block
    width: 100px
</style>
